Title: Age of Uprising: The Legend of Michael Kohlhaas
Writer: Christelle Berthevas (screenplay), Arnaud des Pallières (screenplay), Heinrich von Kleist (novel)
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Mélusine Mayance, Delphine Chuillot, David Kross
Plot: In the 16th century in the Cévennes, a horse dealer by the name of Michael Kohlhaas leads a happy family life. When a lord treats him unjustly, he raises an army and puts the country to fire and sword in order to have his rights restored.
